alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ulster; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ulster County through 700 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ellenville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Paltz, Ellenville, Wallkill, Plattekill, Highland, Modena, Marlboro, Kerhonkson, Napanoch, Wawarsing, Lloyd, Crawford, Gardiner, Tuckers Corner, Forest Glen, Dwaarkill, Awosting, Elting Corners, Ireland Corners and Cragsmoor. This includes Interstate 87 near exit 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
